Reference

All functions

anno_susie()

annotate susie results. this will generate out put txt files

coef(<susie>)

Extract regression coefficients from susie fit

compute_ss()

Compute sufficient statistics for susie.

ctwas()

Causal inference for TWAS

ctwas_rss()

Causal inference for TWAS using summary statistics

filter_regions()

filter regions based on probality of at most 1 causal effect

impute_expr()

Impute expression

impute_expr_z()

Impute expression

index_regions()

Get gene and SNP index for each region

init_finalize()

a susie fit object in order to initialize susie model. Revised from susieR::init_finalize

init_finalize_rss()

a susie fit object in order to initialize susie rss model. Revised from susieR::init_finalize_rss

predict(<susie>)

Predict outcomes or extract coefficients from susie fit.

prep_exprvar()

Prepare .exprvar file

prep_pgen()

Read .pgen file into R

prep_pvar()

Prepare .pvar file

read_expr()

Read .expr file into R

read_exprvar()

Read .exprvar file into R

read_pgen()

Read pgen file into R

read_pvar()

Read .pvar file into R

susie()

SUm of Single Effects (SuSiE) Regression

susieI()

SuSiE iteraitve

susieI_rss()

SuSiE iteraitve rss version

susie_get_cs()

Extract credible sets from SuSiE fit

susie_get_lfsr()

Local false sign rate (lfsr) for susie credible sets.

susie_get_niter()

Get number of iterations from fitted susie model

susie_get_objective()

Get evidence lower bound (ELBO) from fitted susie model

susie_get_pip()

Compute posterior inclusion probability (PIP) for all variables

susie_get_posterior_mean()

Get posterior mean for coefficients from fitted susie model

susie_get_posterior_sd()

Get posterior standard deviation for coefficients from fitted susie model

susie_get_prior_variance()

Get updated prior variance

susie_get_residual_variance()

Get updated residual variance

susie_init_coef()

Initialize a susie object using regression coefficients

susie_rss()

Bayesian sum of single-effect (SuSiE) linear regression using z scores

update_each_effect()

update each effect
